metadata.title: Emergency Triage of Highly Infectious Diseases and Bioterrorism

abstract.original_text: Health systems in all communities are complex networks with many actors unique to each context. In addition to healthcare facilities, these networks include the emergency response system, community health workers, local government and public

sentences.segment_text: Health systems in all communities are complex networks with many actors unique to each context .
these networks include the emergency response system ,
community health workers , local government and public
